mapper.insert: insert into tbl_request ( title, parent_id, sub_category_id, description, content, student_grade, student_gender, createdAt ) values ( #{title}, #{parent_id}, #{sub_category_id}, #{description}, #{content}, #{student_grade}, #{student_gender}, now() )
mapper.select:
select r.title, p.nickname, c.name as category_name, s.name as sub_category_name, r.description, r.content, r.student_grade, r.student_gender
from tbl_request as r
left join tbl_parent as p on r.parent_id = p.parent_id
left join tbl_sub_category as s on r.sub_category_id = s.sub_category_id
left join tbl_category as c on s.category_id = c.category_id
group by r.request_id

select r.title, p.nickname, c.name as category_name, s.name as sub_category_name, r.description, r.content, r.student_grade, r.student_gender
from tbl_request as r
left join tbl_parent as p on r.parent_id = p.parent_id
left join tbl_sub_category as s on r.sub_category_id = s.sub_category_id
left join tbl_category as c on s.category_id = c.category_id
where r.request_id = #{id}
group by r.request_id
